title: Explore Australia 1997 (PC & MAC)
brief_description: Explore Australia 1997 is a cyber guide for the desktop traveller, allowing the user to explore some of Australia’s top tourist destinations without leaving the comforts of home. Search thousands of towns, explore big city highlights, obtain information on Australia’s best national parks, and research accommodation Australia-wide. Easy to use, and can be linked to a companion website packed with additional information.
